svg.title: Anatomy of a Module — Rent Roll Analysis
svg.desc: Exploded engineering schematic showing the internal components of the Rent Roll Analysis module: governing node, skills, configuration, features, and outputs with annotated callouts.

g.text: Methodology: Dual-scenario, market-derived rents, quality gates
+ 4 more skills: Renewal Probability, Market Rent Survey, Rent Growth Forecast, Rent Roll Audit
V3.1 Elevated Design / Calibri Typography / Institutional Quality

svg.text: Every module follows this pattern — Node governs, Skills execute, Config calibrates, Features enforce, Outputs deliver
